But it all started by my cousin who was who was taken to Jordan and she was to work in some family.
And when she went to Jordan, she was to be a house, house help in this family of five people.
And this family started abusing us actually.
So what happened usually they confiscated their their passport.
every night she was being sexual abused in the house. Abused by the father abused by the children.
abused by the boys and also abused by the father and the mother.
she tried, I remember she would send us a message that I don't have my passport.
